characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: This model can Fall Back in your Movement phase and still shoot and/or charge during its turn.  When a Stompa Falls Back, it can move over enemy INFANTRY models, though at the end of its move it must be more than 1" from any enemy models.  A Stompa doesn't suffer the penalty for moving and firing Heavy weapons.  This model only gains a bonus to its saving throws for being in cover if at least half of the model is obscured from the firer.
